author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Add Pixel-only and HCAL-only GPU validation workflows:
  - Pixel only: `#.503` (quadruplets), `#.507` (triplets)
  - HCAL only: `#.523`

Enable the existing Pixel-only and HCAL-only profiling workflows:
  - Pixel only: `#.504` (quadruplets), `#.508` (triplets)
  - HCAL only: `#.524`

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -w gpu -l 11634.503,11634.507,11634.513,11634.523 -j 4 -t 4` is running ...
title: Add Pixel-only and HCAL-only validation workflows
